name: Steampunk Necklace and Earring Set- Amethyst Watch Angel - 5209
description:
Do you ever hear people say that "their watch died"? Have you ever been "killing time"? Well, I found out what happens to watches when they're dead ~ they become angels! Watch angels, to be precise. The take on a new life, and continue on. Do you need an angel to "watch" over you?

This watch angel is a combination of antiqued silver, brass, gold and these really lovely vintage Czech glass beads in a deep shade of amethyst purple. The necklace is 19 inches long, not including the center drop. The earrings are very lightweight, made of the same long drop beads.


Copyright 2008 Rivkasmom.com ©

name: Steampunk Cufflinks - Tempus Fugit 5307
description:
Sleek and shiny! Vintage watch movements in excellent condition. They don't tick anymore, but they are still really cute and stylish. The cufflinks are a "close" perfect match, similar enough in looks to have a nice appearance.

These watch movements are mounted on small gold wings with a wingspan of one inch. The base is a very nice quality gold plate over brass.

This set will arrive in a beautiful black velvet and brass trimmed presentation box.



Lots more cufflinks listed at http://www.rivkasmom.com/category_s/21.htm
Just cut and paste into your browser. :-)

name: Steampunk Unisex Ring - Winged Time 5342
description:
Fully adjustable antiqued silver tone ring, currently set at a size 8, but could easily go up or down a size or so.  This ring features swept back gold wings and a shiny vintage watch movement.


This ring will arrive in a beautiful black velvet and brass trimmed presentation box.

name: Steampunk Ring - Beaded Brass Band 5348
description:
Fully adjustable raw brass ring, currently set at a size 8, but could easily go up or down a size or so.  This ring features a shiny vintage watch movement.  I really like this style because the adjustment happens at the top of the ring, not the bottom, making it very comfortable to wear.  


This ring will arrive in a beautiful black velvet and brass trimmed presentation box.

name: Steampunk Brooch Pin / The Air Pilot's Badge of Honor
description:
This fabulous, one of a kind pin is a large antique clock gear that measures 1 3/4 inches across.  Layers of antiqued silver tone filigree provide the backdrop for the brass hot air balloon and the brass rose.


This pin will arrive in a beautiful black velvet and brass trimmed presentation box.
